info: Very polite and respectful in communication.
Highly active and always willing to help others.
Friendly and easily gets along with everyone.
Quiet observer, speaks only when needed.
Takes initiative in team tasks and is a natural leader.
Very punctual and disciplined in daily routines.
Creative thinker with a positive attitude.
Helpful and always ready to support classmates.
Cheerful personality who keeps the group motivated.
